name: Ciboulette 6
author: Gors
description:
Ciboulette
 (French chives) are known in culinary for its fresh, mild onion-like 
flavor and are employed in many dishes throughout the world. This 
palette captures the greenery of the leaves, the brown dirt and the 
delicate pink flowers to compose a pastel-like, well-rounded palette 
which goes well with mellow, natural compositions but will also work for
 slimes and grime.
